data.title: Simple Mid Box Flash Fight
data.description: Flash off of Boxes outside of Mid Doors to allow you to aggressively peek Mid.

data.title: Flash Pyramid to Hold A Main
data.description: Blindside enemies off of Pyramids to allow you to hold A Site.

data.title: B Site to Attacker Spawn Gatecrash
data.description: This is a good Gatecrash to go from B Site to Attacker Spawn. This allows you to flank Mid and both bomb sites.

data.title: A Tunnel to B Wall Gatecrash
data.description: This is an incredible Gatecrash to rotate to B Site from A Site.

data.title: A Pyramid to A Cave Blindside
data.description: This is a good Blindside to flash enemies pushing onto A Site or to blind enemies playing in A Cave delaying a push.

data.title: A Hall to Attacker Spawn Gatecrash
data.description: This is a good Gatecrash to get into Attacker Spawn and flank Bottom Mid along with both A Site and B Site.
